description:
So many times have I been asked "How difficult is it to set up a Blog site?" So I have made a series of short easy to follow videos, that show step by step how to get started. From buying a domain to installing Wordpress, it couldn't be made more simple.

If you are a complete beginner at website building then you would really benefit from this course.

The course is broken down in to seven short easy to follow videos, so if you are wanting to set up a website for your own blog or for a business this course will get you started.

There is no complicated computer jargon and even things that look complicated are made easy.

At the end of the course you will understand:

  • How to set up a 'Wordpress' website from start to finish.
  • Domain (website address) purchase.
  • Website Hosting.
  • Wordpress (your website platform) and how to install it on your new site.
  • Plugins and and how to install some important ones.

If you are looking for an easy way to get a website set up, then this course is for you. If you have experience of buying a domain and hosting plus installing Wordpress, then this is not for you.
title: Beginners guide to setting up a Wordpress Website
